key: This vehicle makes you cooler, am I right? And it has machine guns, so anyone will agree with you or they will regret it.
English: This vehicle makes you cooler, am I right? And it has machine guns, so anyone will agree with you or they will regret it.
Spanish: Este vehiculo te hace mas guay, no crees? Y tiene ametralladoras, asi que todo el mundo creera lo mismo o se arrepentiran

key: This vehicle has a weapon turret attached. Use it with the mouse AND DESTROY ANYTHING YOU WANT.
English: This vehicle has a weapon turret attached. Use it with the mouse AND DESTROY ANYTHING YOU WANT.
Spanish: Este coche tiene una torreta de armas. Apunta con la camara y DESTRUYE TODO LO QUE QUIERAS
